result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for interacting with the Katana API, including client functionality and data structures for token swap requests.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating API client functionality and data models related to token swaps.

internal/infras/katana/client.go.purpose: This file defines a client for interacting with the Katana API, handling token quotes and retrieval.

internal/infras/katana/client_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the Katana client functionality.

internal/infras/katana/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures and types for handling token swap requests in a blockchain context.
